sentences.en: Cecile was in her early thirties, a sometime actress, dancer and singer.
sentences.cn: 塞茜尔三十出头，曾经做过演员、舞蹈演员和歌手。

sentences.en: Do you suppose we could get together for a little chat sometime soon?
sentences.cn: 我们最近能抽空聚在一起聊上几句吗？

sentences.en: Drop across and have coffee sometime.
sentences.cn: 有空来串门,一块儿喝咖啡.

sentences.en: Drop over and see me sometime.

sentences.cn: 上个月某个时候他曾经来过.

sentences.en: I don't know when you'll receive it. Sometime after I'm gone.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你何时能收到此信,总是在我去世以后.

sentences.en: I'm aiming to get to work by nine sometime.
sentences.cn: 我准备9点左右开始工作。

sentences.en: If you want to run off a copy sometime today, you're welcome to.
sentences.cn: 如果你今天什么时候想复印的话，欢迎你来。

sentences.en: It will happen sometime and somewhere.
sentences.cn: 有朝一日这总会在什么地方发生的.

sentences.en: New students will come to our school sometime next week.
sentences.cn: 新学员将于下周某时来校.

sentences.en: Our house was built sometime around 1973.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子建于1973年左右.

sentences.en: Sir Richard Marsh, the sometime chairman of British Rail
sentences.cn: 理查德•马什爵士，英国铁路公司前董事长

sentences.en: Steel cans were introduced sometime during the forties.
sentences.cn: 钢罐是20世纪40年代时开始使用的。

sentences.en: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentences.cn: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

sentences.en: We’ll take a vacation sometime in September.
sentences.cn: 我们将在 9 月份的某个时候休假。

sentences.en: We'll take our holiday sometime in August, I think.
sentences.cn: 我想我们大概会在八月放假.

sentences.en: We'll take our holiday sometime in July, I think.
sentences.cn: 我想我们大概会在七月放假.

words.tran_cn: 迟的,早的,过去的,近来的
在某一时间,适时,最终,以后,将来,很快

trans.tran_cn: （指某人曾经是…）从前的，一度的，某一时间的
将来某个时候，过去某个时候，改天，来日
trans.tran_en: at a time in the future or in the past, although you do not know exactly when
